pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot. The camera is positioned at a low angle, looking up at a very tall wall covered in small, light-colored tiles. The wall features multiple small, rectangular windows that are brightly illuminated, and a long light fixture is visible at the top of the frame.
